exceptions.exn: Abstracting over the terms "n" and "v" leads to a term fun (n0 : nat) (v0 : vec nat n0) => vec_plus vec_zero v0 = v0 which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "vec_plus" of type "vec nat n -> vec nat n -> vec nat n" cannot be applied to the terms "vec_zero" : "vec nat n" "v0" : "vec nat n0" The 2nd term has type "vec nat n0" which should be coercible to "vec nat n".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
v: Vector.t nat n

Goal:
vec_plus vec_zero v = v

Premises:
vec_zero = vec_set_pos (fun _ : pos n => 0) : vec nat n
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
vec_plus = fun v w : vec nat n => vec_set_pos (fun p : pos n => vec_pos v p + vec_pos w p) : vec nat n -> vec nat n -> vec nat n
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m) (vw : vec ?A (?n + ?m)), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v0, w) -> vw = VectorDef.append v0 w where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.splitat_append : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m), VectorDef.splitat ?n (VectorDef.append v0 w) = (v0, w) where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v0 : vec ?A (S ?n), v0 = VectorDef.hd v0 ## VectorDef.tl v0 where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorEq.cast : vec ?A ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> vec ?A n0 where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?m : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.uncons_cons : forall (a : ?A) (v0 : vec ?A ?n), VectorDef.uncons (a ## v0) = (a, v0) where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v0 : vec ?A n0) (w : vec ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v0 w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v0 p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorSpec.append_comm_cons : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m) (a : ?A), a ## VectorDef.append v0 w = VectorDef.append (a ## v0) w where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.take_O : forall (le : 0 <= ?n) (v0 : vec ?A ?n), VectorDef.take 0 le v0 = vec_nil where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v0 : vec ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v0) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v0 p2) where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorSpec.fold_left_right_assoc_eq : (forall (a : ?A) (b c : ?B), ?f (?f a b) c = ?f (?f a c) b) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v0 : vec ?B n0) (a : ?A), VectorDef.fold_left ?f a v0 = VectorDef.fold_right (fun (x : ?B) (y : ?A) => ?f y x) v0 a where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?f : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- ?A -> ?B -> ?A]
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.take_app : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (m : nat) (w : vec ?A m) (le : ?n <= ?n + m), VectorDef.take ?n le (VectorDef.append v0 w) = v0 where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
vec_map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.fold_right2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C -> ?C) -> ?C -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> ?C where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.fold_left2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C -> ?A) -> ?A -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 -> ?A where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.Forall2_nil : forall P : ?A -> ?B -> Prop, VectorDef.Forall2 P vec_nil vec_nil where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.nth_order : vec ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, p < ?n -> ?A where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorDef.take : forall p : nat, p <= ?n -> vec ?A ?n -> vec ?A p where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.trunc : forall p : nat, ?n > p -> vec ?A ?n -> vec ?A (?n - p) where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorDef.fold_right : (?A -> ?B -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> ?B -> ?B where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.replace_order : vec ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, p < ?n -> ?A -> vec ?A ?n where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorDef.fold_left : (?B -> ?A -> ?B) -> ?B -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> ?B where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorSpec.take_prf_irr : forall (p n0 : nat) (v0 : vec ?A n0) (le0 le' : p <= n0), VectorDef.take p le0 v0 = VectorDef.take p le' v0 where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
ByteVector.to_string = fun n : nat => Basics.compose ByteVector.little_endian_to_string Vector.rev : forall n : nat, ByteVector.ByteVector n -> String.string Arguments ByteVector.to_string {n}%nat_scope
case0 : forall P : vec ?A 0 -> Type, P vec_nil -> forall v : vec ?A 0, P v where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.case0 : forall P : vec ?A 0 -> Type, P vec_nil -> forall v : vec ?A 0, P v where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.caseS' : forall (v0 : vec ?A (S ?n)) (P : vec ?A (S ?n) -> Type), (forall (h : ?A) (t : vec ?A ?n), P (h ## t)) -> P v0 where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
caseS' : forall (v0 : vec ?A (S ?n)) (P : vec ?A (S ?n) -> Type), (forall (h : ?A) (t : vec ?A ?n), P (h ## t)) -> P v0 where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.take_idem : forall (p n0 : nat) (v0 : vec ?A n0) (le0 : p <= n0) (le' : p <= p), VectorDef.take p le' (VectorDef.take p le0 v0) = VectorDef.take p le0 v0 where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.of_list : forall l : list ?A, vec ?A (length l) where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.const : ?A -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.Forall_nil : forall P : ?A -> Prop, VectorDef.Forall P vec_nil where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
Fin.L_R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorDef.Exists2_cons_hd : forall (P : ?A -> ?B -> Prop) (m : nat) (x1 : ?A) (x2 : ?B) (v1 : vec ?A m) (v2 : vec ?B m), P x1 x2 -> VectorDef.Exists2 P (x1 ## v1) (x2 ## v2) where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.Exists2_cons_tl : forall (P : ?A -> ?B -> Prop) (m : nat) (x1 : ?A) (x2 : ?B) (v1 : vec ?A m) (v2 : vec ?B m), VectorDef.Exists2 P v1 v2 -> VectorDef.Exists2 P (x1 ## v1) (x2 ## v2) where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
vec_pos_plus : forall (v w : vec nat n) (p : pos n), vec_pos (vec_plus v w) p = vec_pos v p + vec_pos w p
tail_plus = fix tail_plus (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S n0 => tail_plus n0 (S m) end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments tail_plus (_ _)%nat_scope

``` 
induction v.
- unfold vec_plus, vec_zero. apply VectorSpec.Forall2_nil.
- simpl. unfold vec_plus in *. rewrite IHv. apply VectorDef.replace_order. apply pos_S_inv. left. apply case0. apply VectorSpec.take_O.
```

original: induction v. - unfold vec_plus, vec_zero. apply VectorSpec.Forall2_nil. - simpl. unfold vec_plus in *. rewrite IHv. apply VectorDef.replace_order. apply pos_S_inv. left. apply case0. apply VectorSpec.take_O.
